messageBody:
Hi Anitha,

I would appreciate if you can let me know where you are working. Any way this is Bharadwaj searching for jobs on testing. I was just registered as I am interested for JAVA testing But I didn;t get much info.

Hey please do mail me any testing material if you have ny.

I would be thankful to you,

bharadwaj.

Sure I will try to mail you regd db conn soon after I consult my friends.


Yours Lovingly,
Arvind B Josyula
